name: Idle Tick
description:
Idle Tick is a complex idle game with unique gameplay. No ruthless clicking and boring idleness. Hover a special area to generate money and get bonuses. Hold your mouse longer to get more income. Remove your mouse to buy upgrades but you will lost the current combo streak.

Spend three in-game currencies for various upgrades. Feel free to convert them between each other to meet current needs.

Buy powerful prestige upgrades for permanent improvements. You will lose all progress but keep new bonuses.

UNIQUE GAMEPLAY

No boring idleness and infinite clicking. Try a completely new approach to generating income

CURRENCIES AND UPGRADES

Three different currencies for more complex management. Use each one to buy various upgrades

PRESTIGE SYSTEM

Buy permanent super upgrades to improve your stats. Start a fresh game but with significantly increased powers

GRAPHICS AND MUSIC

Cute pixel UI with customizable color themes and effects. Also dozens background tracks for your pleasure

STATS AND ACHIEVEMENTS

Track your progress with various in-game stats. And are you lucky enough to unlock all achievements?

COMPLETE THE GAME

Unlike other idle clicker games this one can be completed. But do you have the patience and strength for this?


Idle Tick contains a lof of fun and features you've never seen before. Try it now!
